definition: a characteristic likelihood of or natural disposition toward a certain condition or character or effect
details:
noun
- a characteristic likelihood of or natural disposition toward a certain condition or character or effect
= synonyms: inclination
- an attitude of mind especially one that favors one alternative over others
= synonyms: disposition
- an inclination to do something
= synonyms: leaning
- a general direction in which something tends to move
= example: a general direction in which something tends to move
= synonyms: trend
